metadata.title: CVE-2022-47942 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in ksmbd in the Linux kernel 5.15 through 5.19before 5.19.2. There is a heap-based buffer overflow in set_ntacl_dacl,related to use of SMB2_QUERY_INFO_HE after a malformed SMB2_SET_INFO_HEcommand.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-47942` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-5.15.0-53-generic - 5.15.0-53.59
linux-image-5.15.0-53-generic-lpae - 5.15.0-53.59
linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-53-generic - 5.15.0-53.59
linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-53-generic-64k - 5.15.0-53.59
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-1021-kvm - 5.15.0-1021.26
No subscription required
